document.full_text: los angeles dodgers owner frank mccourt, blamed for lax security at dodger stadium following the brutal beating of a san francisco giants fan, said on friday that he had gotten the message and would "redouble" efforts to make the ballpark safer.
document.title: dodgers owner mccourt promises to make stadium safer
lines_and_colors: los angeles dodgers owner frank mccourt, blamed for lax security at dodger stadium following the brutal beating of a san francisco giants fan, said on friday that he had gotten the message and would "redouble" efforts to make the ballpark safer.
